items.title: Connect
items.text:
Example use cases Pet and animal information for charitiesLoyalty programme physical characteristics

Store pet ownership data alongside donor profiles to personalise communications and segment audiences.

Record attributes such as pet type, pet name, and pet age under Individuals. When donors update their information through different channels like website, events, or phone, all sources automatically update the same attributes.

Capture physical characteristics from your loyalty programme data without creating complex table joins.

Use attributes to store information such as height, eye colour, and clothing size against individual records. This allows your retail team to access and segment customers by these characteristics directly in audience selection, making it easier to personalise product recommendations and targeted offers.

items.title: Orin AI assistant
items.text: Orin is your AI chat assistant that helps you work with your Orbit system.

items.title: Prerequisites
items.text:
Before you can access Orin, your system administrator must enable it on your system.

To enable Orin on your system:

  1. Work with your system administrator to enable Orin using the installation and configuration steps.
  2. Toggle on the Orin feature switch under Features in Application Settings.

items.title: Accessing Orin
items.text:
You can open Orin from anywhere in Orbit.

To open Orin:

  1. Click the Orin icon at the bottom left of your screen.
  2. Start typing your prompt!

items.title: Daily message limit
items.text:
You have a limited number of messages you can send to Orin each day. The number of remaining messages displays in the Orin interface.

If you reach your daily message limit, you can't ask more questions until the following day. Your message allowance resets at midnight.
